news.title: Martha Nolan-O’Slat­arra’s family ‘stunned’ by claims made to US detectives that she was battling brain cancer before death
news.summary: Claims that an Irish woman found dead on a yacht in the US had been battling brain cancer are being investigated by detectives probing her death.

news.title: From Israel to his mother’s tears and a vow to ‘Make Ireland home again’ – here’s what we learnt from Gareth Sheridan’s presidential campaign launch
news.summary: Businessman and entrepreneur Gareth Sheridan has officially launched his bid to be president of Ireland. Here is what we learnt about the 35-year-old Dublin man, who is running as an Independent candidate.

news.title: Young renter ‘forced to throw out clothes and is suffering recurring chest infections’ due to mould issues
news.summary: A young woman renting an apartment has claimed severe issues with mould have affected her health, destroyed some of her clothing and are causing a “constant damp smell”.

news.title: Trump heads to Alaska summit with Putin, says he wants Ukraine ceasefire 'today'
news.summary: Donald Trump said he wanted to see a ceasefire "today" as he headed to Alaska on Friday for a summit with Russia's Vladimir Putin to help end the deadliest war in Europe since World War Two.

news.title: Frances Fitzgerald rules herself out of presidential race as Michael Healy Rae backs Heather Humphreys for Áras bid
news.summary: Former Tánaiste Frances Fitzgerald will not be seeking the nomination to be Fine Gael’s candidate in the presidential election, following the departure of Mairead McGuinness as her party’s candidate.

news.title: Premier League jury: Champions, who will be relegated and a player to watch – our writers’ predictions for this season
news.summary: Ahead of the 2025/26 Premier League kick-off, our team of writers give their verdicts on the hot topics that will shape the season ahead.

news.title: Orange warning issued for forest fires as temperatures could hit highs of 27C this weekend
news.summary: The Department of Agriculture has issued a Condition Orange Forest Fire warning ahead of the hot weather this weekend when temperatures could climb as high 27C.

news.title: Modern Morals: My mother-in-law plans to wear an off-white dress to my wedding. How do I tell her I’m not okay with that at all?
'They were being fully intimate on the train at 11 o’clock in the morning': Irish passengers share their public transport horror stories
news.summary: Love it or hate it, public transport is a core part of most of our lives. August is a busy time of year for planes, trains and buses with so many of us heading off on holiday at home or abroad, and public transport is sure to be under pressure.

news.title: The summer I went to Irish college – ‘Boys from the southside of Dublin or the west of Ireland were both new breeds I hadn’t met before’
